ambientFactor.description: Per-component factors to apply to values of ambientTexture.

ambientTexture.description: ID of RGB texture defining the amount of ambient light reflected from the surface of the object.

diffuseFactor.description: Per-component factors to apply to values of diffuseTexture.

diffuseTexture.description: ID of RGBA texture defining the amount of light diffusely reflected from the surface of the object.

emissionFactor.description: Per-component factors to apply to values of emissionTexture.

emissionTexture.description: ID of RGB texture for defining the amount of light emitted by the surface of the object.

specularFactor.description: Per-component factors to apply to values of specularTexture.

specularTexture.description: ID of RGB texture defining the amount of light specularly reflected from the surface of the object.

shininess.description: Specularity or roughness of the specular reflection lobe of the object.

transparency.description: Amount of transparency as an opacity value between 0.0 and 1.0.
